title: Auto Repair fucked me out of promos

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
Just loading into game everything's normal. then I get bug splatted and league client starts auto repair(which I didn't even know was a function) and I can't reconnect. I get fucked out of a ranked promo bo5 game and I can't do shit about it. my client has no bugs. I have haven't bug splatted in 2 years and I've literally never auto repaired before. 

I removed soft repair from my installation folder cuz I don't play that shit. Rito you owe me my series :P

replies.body: Those auto-repatches only happen when the client notices some missing or otherwise damaged files, so it's always a good idea to let those run their course. If you see this keep happening over and over, there's a good chance that your client is hitting some kind of roadblock while trying to patch. In that case, grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a force repatch as well as running through the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974).
